section_description:
TAD:

- Currently fully rolled out to iOS users 
- Targeting Android users via experiment: `mobile_offline_mode_feature`
title: Offline mode: Verify pro can clock in
custom_preconds: Post a upcoming shift which starts soon as Partner and assign the shift to a pro

custom_steps_separated.content: Login a the Pro and navigate to shift details screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: Should display the clock in button and enabled

custom_steps_separated.content: Disable the internet network on your device and navigate back to shift details screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
There should be a banner in the top of the screen with the text:

"You seem to be offline, Connect to the network and try again" and the clock in button is enabled

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/tuv12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999901)

custom_steps_separated.content: Press the try again link from the top yellow banner
custom_steps_separated.expected: The same screen should be reloaded with the yellow banner still visible
Should still display the same screen as shown in step 2

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on clock in button and enter the code and hit save
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Should display "No service" Don't worry, we will save your clock-in once you get connection back." 


![](index.php?/attachments/get/tuv12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999902)

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on Got it and it should navigate back to shift details screen with clock in button still enabled
custom_steps_separated.expected: Should display the shift details screen with clock in button still enabled

custom_steps_separated.content: Turn back the internet connection on Pros device and navigate to shift details screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro should be Clocked in and check the AdminPortal for shift log and it should display supervised_offline_retry_clock_in as reason - https://admin.staging.example.com/backend/shift/VXz4egy/change/ and make sure the clock in timing logged is same as the timing used during offline clockin timing
